data.description:
Novobeing is a VR well-being application that combines meditation, breathwork, music, and multisensory environments to help you achieve relaxation effortlessly.

Download our app for free and immerse yourself in multisensory meditation and breathwork experiences, designed to help you relax, quiet your mind, and cultivate positive thoughts and emotions. Novobeing is designed to enhance traditional modalities such as meditation and breathwork by infusing them with interactivity, engagement, and fun. By transporting you to tranquil meditative states, Novobeing facilitates stress relief, mental clarity, and inner peace.

Unlock the healing power of your breath with meditation experiences that are tailored to your mood and stress levels and change your mental state on-demand with: 

âœ… Proven Breathing Techniques
âœ… Animations to time your breath
âœ… Environments that naturally boost your mood
âœ… Music that makes you feel amazing

Our multiplayer system is being tested and is not live yet, but you can try a demo class experience as we work towards launching it soon. Once launched, we plan to offer:

âœ… Daily Meditation Classes
âœ… Live Meditation and Breathwork Training Programs
âœ… Weekly Q&As and events with Health Experts

Get our free app during our BETA phase and sign up on our website for lifetime access, product updates, and more:

https://www.novobeing.com/earlyaccess
